    • validateToyPrice

      public static boolean validateToyPrice(double price) throws NegativePriceException
      Parameters:
      price - the price of the toy.
      Returns:
      true for positive price
      Throws:
      NegativePriceException - shows an error message about the negative price.

    • validateBoardgamePlayers

      public static boolean validateBoardgamePlayers(int minPlys, int maxPlys) throws InvalidNumberOfPlayersException
      Parameters:
      minPlys - the minimum # of players to play the game.
      maxPlys - the maximum # of players to play the game.
      Returns:
      true if no exception is thrown.
      Throws:
      InvalidNumberOfPlayersException - shows an error message about the number of players.
